thread.title: ISIS releases astonishing pictures of its fairgrounds in Iraq and Syria
thread.title_full: ISIS releases astonishing pictures of its fairgrounds in Iraq and Syria - Mirror Online

author: Jasper Hamill
title: ISIS releases astonishing pictures of its fairgrounds in Iraq and Syria
text:
The so-called Islamic State has released a series of pictures apparently showing two separate theme parks set up to entertain the children living under its brutal rule.
To mark last week's Eid Al-Adha, ISIS says it set up a fairground near the Iraqi city of Fallujah and another near the Syrian city of Raqqa.
The miniature train line at the Fallujah Ride City
Photographs of the two grim-looking amusement parks were then published on a website extremists use to share news, propaganda and religious instruction . The tea cup ride at the Islamic State fun park near Fallujah
The exact locations of the two carnivals has not been revealed.
In a series of astonishing image, the slick ISIS media wing showed off the "Grand Opening" of a funfair near Fallujah.
The swing carousel at a fun park near Raqqa
Dubbed "Ride City", its centre piece is a cups and saucers ride which will be familiar to any British fairground-goer.
Surrounded by dusty desert, this grim-looking amusement park also features a miniature train, big wheel and a carousel.
https://justpaste.it/nykd One of the rides at the Raqqa theme park
The images reportedly from Fallujah show happy children, segregated by sex, and a stunning picture of a smiling young girl without a headscarf.
In Raqqa, revellers were apparently treated to a rusty-looking swing ride and a bouncy castle.
This picture of the Raqqa swing ride features a mysterious blonde girl
The happy scene is marred by the wreckage of what appear to be bombed out buildings.
Earlier this year, the Islamic State released a video showing a theme park near the Iraqi city of Mosul , which appeared to be slightly better-equipped than the latest ones.
